extension.name: editor4roks
extension.author: Marcos Rego
extension.description:
Plugin that adds the WYSIWYG HTML Editor to the custom descriptions of your Roksprocket Modules. With editor4roks activated the descriptions will be easier to edit and the links easier to put directly on the modules.

editor4roks Roksprocket on RocketTheme website NicEdit editor website

This is not an official plugin of RocketTheme.
editor4roks is released under the GNU/GPL v2 license.

field.name: editoroption
field.label: Editor
field.description: Choose 'Joomla Default' to use the default editor selected in 'Global Configuration', this will also change the method to insert images inside Roksprocket. If you prefer to keep using the default Media Manager choose 'NicEdit' instead.

field.name: links4roks
field.label: links4roks
field.description: When enabled, the edit button will also appear next to the custom links inputs, giving access to the Link Editor to easily select an existing link.

field.name: links
field.label: Links
field.description: Choose which type of links should appear when the editor NicEdit or links4roks is enabled.

field.name: roks4mob
field.label: roks4mob
field.description: When enabled, Roksprocket's layout will be more friendly on mobile devices.
